item.title: Awards & Honors
item.description:
• Ph.D. Studentship, Networked Society Institute (NSI), Australia, Jan 2017.
  • Colciencias Doctoral Scholarship, Colombian Government, Jan 2017.
  • Melbourne School of Engineering Conference Travel Scholarships, Australia, Apr 2018.
  • Research internship, Networked Society Institute (NSI), Melbourne, Australia, Jan 2015.
  • Colfuturo’s scholarship, Colombia, Jul 2014.
  • Distinguished Student Award, The University of Valle, Colombia, Nov 2011.
